name: alertpay
overview: AlertPay Inc. operates an online payment platform. It offers remittances, currency exchange services, online business management, invoices, money deposits and withdraws, commissions, and referral rewards and bonuses. The company also provides business profiles, mass pay and payouts, shopping carts, and seller protection services. In addition, AlertPay offers foreign exchange, localized banking, fraud prevention, email invoicing, mass and single remittances, and business management tools. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Montreal, Canada. It has locations in Mumbai, India; and Moscow, Russian Federation. As of April 3, 2012, AlertPay Inc. operates as a subsidiary of MH Pillars …
